page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Apart from farming, there a few sources of employment. A joiner's yard near Loud Higher Bridge employs a dozen men and a restaurant at Blacksticks Farm provides casual, part-time employment for women and ypung people. There is a small, family-run horticultural nursery at New House near Stony Lane Farm and at Lyndeth, near Barns Fold, Arab horses are bred, on a small scale. Many people work outside the area, usually in the professions or in mamagement. A high-school teacher, a surgeon, a consultant engineer and a sales representative are typical of those who live here but work elsewhere.
